price: আকাশসমূহ আৰু পৃথিৱীত যি আছে সেই সকলো তেওঁৰেই। সকলো তেওঁৰেই অনুগত।
arabic: وَلَهُۥ مَن فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ كُلّٞ لَّهُۥ قَٰنِتُونَ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: walahu man fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi kullun lahu qānitūna
